00029 #ifndef SC_COMMUNICATION_IDS_H
00030 #define SC_COMMUNICATION_IDS_H
00031 
00032 
00033 #include "sysc/utils/sc_report.h"
00034 
00035 
00036 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 //  Report ids (communication)
00038 //
00039 //  Report ids in the range of 100-199.
00040 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042 #ifndef SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE
00043 #define SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE(id,unused1,unused2) \
00044     namespace sc_core { extern SC_API const char id[]; }
00045 namespace sc_core {
00046     extern SC_API const char SC_ID_REGISTER_ID_FAILED_[]; // in sc_report_handler.cpp
00047 } // namespace sc_core
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_PORT_OUTSIDE_MODULE_, 100,
00051                         "port specified outside of module" )
00052 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_CLOCK_PERIOD_ZERO_, 101,
00053                         "sc_clock period is zero" )              
00054 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_CLOCK_HIGH_TIME_ZERO_, 102,
00055                         "sc_clock high time is zero" )    
00056 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_CLOCK_LOW_TIME_ZERO_, 103,
00057                         "sc_clock low time is zero" )     
00058 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_MORE_THAN_ONE_FIFO_READER_, 104,
00059                         "sc_fifo<T> cannot have more than one reader" )
00060 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_MORE_THAN_ONE_FIFO_WRITER_, 105,
00061                         "sc_fifo<T> cannot have more than one writer" )
00062 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_INVALID_FIFO_SIZE_, 106,
00063                         "sc_fifo<T> must have a size of at least 1" )
00064 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_BIND_IF_TO_PORT_, 107,
00065                         "bind interface to port failed" ) 
00066 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_BIND_PORT_TO_PORT_, 108,
00067                         "bind parent port to port failed" )
00068 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_COMPLETE_BINDING_, 109,
00069                         "complete binding failed" )
00070 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_INSERT_PORT_, 110,
00071                         "insert port failed" )
00072 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_REMOVE_PORT_, 111,
00073                         "remove port failed" )
00074 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_GET_IF_, 112,
00075                         "get interface failed" )
00076 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_INSERT_PRIM_CHANNEL_, 113,
00077                         "insert primitive channel failed" )
00078 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_REMOVE_PRIM_CHANNEL_, 114, 
00079                         "remove primitive channel failed" ) 
00080 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_MORE_THAN_ONE_SIGNAL_DRIVER_, 115,
00081                         "sc_signal<T> cannot have more than one driver" )
00082 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_NO_DEFAULT_EVENT_,    116,
00083                         "channel doesn't have a default event" )
00084 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_RESOLVED_PORT_NOT_BOUND_, 117,
00085                         "resolved port not bound to resolved signal" )
00086 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_FIND_EVENT_, 118,
00087                         "find event failed" )
00088 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_INVALID_SEMAPHORE_VALUE_,  119,
00089                         "sc_semaphore requires an initial value >= 0" )
00090 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_SC_EXPORT_HAS_NO_INTERFACE_,  120,
00091                         "sc_export instance has no interface" )
00092 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_INSERT_EXPORT_,  121,
00093     "insert sc_export failed" )
00094 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_EXPORT_OUTSIDE_MODULE_, 122,
00095     "sc_export specified outside of module" )
00096 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_SC_EXPORT_NOT_REGISTERED_,  123,
00097     "remove sc_export failed, sc_export not registered" )
00098 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_SC_EXPORT_NOT_BOUND_AFTER_CONSTRUCTION_,  124,
00099     "sc_export instance not bound to interface at end of construction" )
00100 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_ATTEMPT_TO_WRITE_TO_CLOCK_,  125,
00101    "attempt to write the value of an sc_clock instance" )
00102 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_SC_EXPORT_ALREADY_BOUND_,  126,
00103     "sc_export instance already bound" )
00104 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_OPERATION_ON_NON_SPECIALIZED_SIGNAL_,  127,
00105     "attempted specalized signal operation on non-specialized signal" )
00106 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_ATTEMPT_TO_BIND_CLOCK_TO_OUTPUT_,  128,
00107     "attempted to bind sc_clock instance to sc_inout or sc_out" )
00108 SC_DEFINE_MESSAGE( SC_ID_NO_ASYNC_UPDATE_,  129,
00109     "this build has no asynchronous update support" )
